https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/f7isF2UVcSSmqVZ8qW0r3q37KTZ.jpg With the murders of over 50 gay men in the last 20 years Israel faces a serious problem. While many of the perpetrators have been caught and convicted on a case by case basis, this film looks at the underlying issues. Cause of Death: Homophobia
